Finding aid for
Jerome Cyril Knowlton Autograph Book
titlepage.author:
Finding aid created by
Bentley Historical Library Staff

did.unittitle: Jerome Cyril Knowlton autograph book and photographs 1892
did.abstract: Professor of law at the University of Michigan. Collection consists of autographs and sentiments of University of Michigan faculty and photographs.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is sheld by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Jerome Cyril Knowlton autograph book and photographs, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Jerome C. Knowlton joined the faculty as a full-time professor in 1886/87. He served as Dean of the Law School, 1891-1895, and returned to the faculty until is death in 1916.

scopecontent.p: The Knowlton collection consists of autographs and sentiments of University of Michigan faculty and photographs of Knowlton in classroom and with family members and a childhood photograph of Knowlton's daughter.
